segment.source: About the Virtual File System Tab
segment.target: About the Virtual File System Tab

segment.source: About the Virtual File System Tab
segment.target: About the Virtual File System Tab

segment.source: About the Virtual File System Tab
segment.target: About the Virtual File System Tab

segment.source: The virtual file system is created during sequencing.
segment.target: The virtual file system is created during sequencing.

segment.source: It maps directories and files that are added or modified outside the package root directory.
segment.target: It maps directories and files that are added or modified outside the package root directory.

segment.source: The Virtual File System tab displays the entire virtual file system for a sequenced application package.
segment.target: The Virtual File System tab displays the entire virtual file system for a sequenced application package.

segment.source: It also allows you to add, edit, and delete file associations.
segment.target: It also allows you to add, edit, and delete file associations.

segment.source: For information about the virtual file system and its use, see the section “VFS Installs” of Advanced Sequencing Topics, at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114543.
segment.target: For information about the virtual file system and its use, see the section “VFS Installs” of Advanced Sequencing Topics, at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114543.

segment.source: Displays the application's component files in the SFT file as they will be distributed on an Application Virtualization Desktop Client.
segment.target: Displays the application's component files in the SFT file as they will be distributed on an Application Virtualization Desktop Client.

segment.source: Displays the application's component files as they have been distributed by the application installer on the Application Virtualization Sequencer.
segment.target: Displays the application's component files as they have been distributed by the application installer on the Application Virtualization Sequencer.
